text: Thoothukudi Fast Track Mahila Court Judge, J. Flora on Monday sentenced a man accused of sexually assaulting an eight year old girl to undergo 10 years of rigorous imprisonment. According to prosecution, J. Karthikeyan (50) of Kovankadu, paternal uncle of the victim, was found guilty of the crime took place on September 10 in 2013 and Kulasekarapattinam police filed a case. A fine of Rs.5, 000 was also imposed on him.
title: Man gets 10 year RI
